column3: 1 Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk
2 Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 1 minute
5 Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug
4 Add-Add 2 pieces of chocolate to the mug
3 Add-Add 1 teaspoon of white sugar to the mug
6 Mix-Mix the contents of the mug
7 Heat-Heat the contents of the mug for 1 minute and serve
